struct  TimeoutInfoEq

Detailed Description

Manager of timeout events, allows for registering timeouts, firing passed timeouts and requesting delta to the next timeout.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

libnetworkd::TimeoutManager::~TimeoutManager (  ) 

Destruct the manager and free all allocated timeouts.

Member Function Documentation

Timeout libnetworkd::TimeoutManager::scheduleTimeout ( unsigned int  delta,
TimeoutReceiver *  receiver 
)

Schedule a new timeout, passed to the registered receiver.

Parameters:
delta[in] Offset in seconds for this timeout to be fired.
receiver[in] TimeoutReceiver of this timeout.

void libnetworkd::TimeoutManager::dropTimeout ( Timeout  timeout  ) 

Unregister the given timeout and don't call it after specified delta.

Parameters:
timeout[in] Timeout to be dropped.

void libnetworkd::TimeoutManager::dropReceiver ( TimeoutReceiver *  receiver  ) 

Unregister all timeouts of the specified TimeoutReceiver.

Parameters:
receiver[in] TimeoutReceiver which's timeouts are dropped.

unsigned int libnetworkd::TimeoutManager::deltaNext (  )  [inline]

Get the delta from now to the next event in seconds.

void libnetworkd::TimeoutManager::fireTimeouts (  ) 

Fire all events which's delta has passed until now.
